summary.para: Defines how Extended Protection is validated. For most configurations, the runtime can automatically determine what needs to be validated based on the presence of the . However, if the SSL connection is terminated at an intermediary such as a proxy prior to reaching the server then the validation method must change, and this scenario cannot be automatically detected.
There is no SSL connection between the client and the server, or the SSL connection is terminated at the server. This is the default.
An SSL connection exists but is terminated at an intermediary. The connection between the intermediary and the server may or may not use SSL. When this property is set, must be set as well.
